amendment.description: To ensure that current retirees who have prescription drug coverage who will lose their prescription drug coverage as a result of the enactment of this legislation have the option of drug coverage under the Medicare fallback.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1111 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 259.

action.text: Amendment SA 1111 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8632, S8660-8663, S8674; text: CR S8632) To ensure that current retirees who have prescription drug coverage who will lose their prescription drug coverage as a result of the enactment of this legislation have the option of drug coverage under the Medicare fallback.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1111 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 259.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1111 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 259.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1111 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Levin.
